headerDisplay: Connect your Duco ventilation system (DucoBox Energy, Focus, Silent) to Apple HomeKit via the Connectivity Board 2.0 local API.
footerDisplay: After setup, a dashboard is available at http://[homebridge-ip]:8581 showing sensor graphs and ventilation history.

host.title: Duco Connectivity Board IP Address
host.description: The IP address of your Duco Connectivity Board on your local network.

port.title: Port
port.description: HTTP port of the Duco Connectivity Board (default: 80).

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: How often to poll the Duco for sensor updates. Lower = more responsive but more network traffic.

dashboardPort.title: Dashboard Port
dashboardPort.description: Port for the sensor graphs dashboard web interface.

boostDurationMinutes.title: Boost Duration (minutes)
boostDurationMinutes.description: How long the Boost switch keeps ventilation on medium speed (default: 45 min = 3Ã—15 min).

dataRetentionDays.title: Data Retention (days)
dataRetentionDays.description: How many days of sensor history to keep for the dashboard graphs.
